name: surface-sphere-triangular-patches
author: Washington University School of Medicin
description:
DIVIDE STANDARD SPHERE INTO PATCHES.

Divide the given undistorted sphere into equally-sized triangular patches.  Patches overlap by a border of 1 vertex.

inputs.name: sphere
inputs.description: an undistorted, regularly divided icosahedral sphere

inputs.name: divisions
inputs.description: how many pieces to divide each icosahedral edge into, must divide perfectly into the given sphere

inputs.name: text-out
inputs.description: output - text file for the vertex numbers of the patches
